backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles and CRUD operations for semesters, courses, schedules, and absences with per-user access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record listing files and components involved in improved semester creation error handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and generated content.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration for the Android app including app metadata, server settings, and plugin options.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Markdown guide explaining how to build the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light and dark theme variables with a terracotta color system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file configuring viewport settings, mobile web app tags, theme color, and root script mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry defining router setup, authentication flow, profile setup gating, and theming.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: UI component handling loading, error, and empty states with alerts and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate showing login UI and context-specific error messages for native vs browser environments.
Main app layout with navigation, user menu, and logout handling supporting desktop and mobile views.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for entering and submitting a user's name and optional email to create their profile.
frontend/src/components/schedule/Schedul: Dialog for creating or editing a schedule item with course, day, and time selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useAbsences.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and adding absence records using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourses.ts: Hooks for retrieving and creating courses through the actor API with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; feature-specific hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchedule.ts: Hooks for fetching and creating schedule items through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSemesters.ts: Hooks for retrieving and creating semesters using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a warm color theme with light/dark mode plus mobile-focused layout fixes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AbsencesPage.tsx: Displays absences per course and provides a dialog for recording new absences.
frontend/src/pages/ManagePage.tsx: Manages semesters and courses, including creation dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Shows high-level semester reports with absence summaries and perâ€‘course breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyHoursPage.tsx: Placeholder page outlining planned weekly hours tracking features.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklySchedulePage.ts: Displays weekly schedule items grouped by day and supports adding or editing entries.
frontend/src/state/selection.ts: Provides React hooks for selecting and persisting week ranges and semesters using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes unknown error values into readable strings with fallbacks for toast display.
frontend/src/utils/isNativeApp.ts: Detects Capacitor or WebView environments and returns the running platform (android, ios, or web).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash/query routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app scope, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
